Docs.summary: Gets a matrix representation of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] transformation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The Value property inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D> class. The Value property enables you to convert any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D> object into a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D> object. Because the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform> class is defined by using a Matrix3D, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D.Matrix%2A> and Value properties always return the same value. The MatrixTransform3D class exposes the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix%2A> property to enable write access.
